divs: Sighting Detailsi was inside the house at about 4pm the day i witnessed the object. my uncle was outside laying on a lawn ottoman or chair when i walked outside he said to me "look up" so i did, and there it was, a shiny chrome triangle just hovering there, and i was like "what the heck is that".i asked my uncle how long he had been looking at it he said for about 10 or 15 min. so i looked back up at it and its still hovering right there at about a mile up it seemed, but it was very clear that it was not man made. then i heard my mom coming into the kitchen, i looked down to tell my mom "look at this thing" as soon as i said that my uncle said "whoop there it went"(in spanish). he said "it just took off"(west).from a hovering position to just take off, that was just strange. i was 11yrs old and i know what i had seen. to this day i think i am very lucky to have witnessed this object. i now am 35yrs old living in utah for the last three years and i have seen some things out here.my daughter and i witnessed something strange together up in the skies of utah. thats another story i will let you in on next time. thanks for this opportunity to tell my(true)story.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Spring Valley
There were no other sightings in Spring Valley on or around November 14th 1984
